all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, if you shall build up my church, upon the foundation of my gospel and my rock, the gates of hell shall not prevail against you.
Doctrine and Covenants 18:5
Quote of the Day
"When we choose to let God be the most powerful influence in our life over our self-serving pursuits, we can make progress in our discipleship."
Ulisses Soares | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
